code:
/**
 * Translation from legacy `keyCode` to HTML5 `key`
 * Only special keys supported, all others depend on keyboard layout or browser
 * @see https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent#Key_names
 */
var translateToKey = {
  '8': 'Backspace',
  '9': 'Tab',
  '12': 'Clear',
  '13': 'Enter',
  '16': 'Shift',
  '17': 'Control',
  '18': 'Alt',
  '19': 'Pause',
  '20': 'CapsLock',
  '27': 'Escape',
  '32': ' ',
  '33': 'PageUp',
  '34': 'PageDown',
  '35': 'End',
  '36': 'Home',
  '37': 'ArrowLeft',
  '38': 'ArrowUp',
  '39': 'ArrowRight',
  '40': 'ArrowDown',
  '45': 'Insert',
  '46': 'Delete',
  '112': 'F1',
  '113': 'F2',
  '114': 'F3',
  '115': 'F4',
  '116': 'F5',
  '117': 'F6',
  '118': 'F7',
  '119': 'F8',
  '120': 'F9',
  '121': 'F10',
  '122': 'F11',
  '123': 'F12',
  '144': 'NumLock',
  '145': 'ScrollLock',
  '224': 'Meta'
};
export default translateToKey;
